sentences.en: " Quack! " came the cry of a startled water bird.
sentences.cn: “ 嘎 —— ” 传来一声水禽被惊动的呜叫.

sentences.en: A quack - quack here! Here a quack! There a quack! Everywhere a quack - quack.
sentences.cn: 嘎嘎这里! 这里有个鸭子! 他们有个鸭子! 到处都是嘎嘎.

sentences.en: For the rest it was just a noise, a quack - quack - quacking.
sentences.cn: 除此之外,便是一片噪声, 一片嘎嘎嘎的叫嚣.

sentences.en: He describes himself as a doctor, but I feel he is a quack.
sentences.cn: 他自称是医生, 可是我感觉他是个江湖骗子.

sentences.en: He is a quack and prescribes his quack medicines.
sentences.cn: 他是个庸医,开的是假药方.

sentences.en: I simply spat my contempt and threw the drug back to the quack.
sentences.cn: 我愤怒地表示了我的蔑视,把药扔回给那个江湖医生.

sentences.en: It was the age of horse sense and the quack.
sentences.cn: 那是个骗子和庸医横行的年代.

sentences.en: She discovered that the man was a quack.

sentences.cn: 他突然听见一声嘎嘎的叫声。

sentences.en: That doctor is a quack, he should be reported.
sentences.cn: 那医生是个“江湖骗子”, 应该被检举.

sentences.en: That doctor is just a quack , he should be reported.
sentences.cn: 那医生是个江湖骗子, 应该被检举.

sentences.en: That quack caused me more harm than the disease did.
sentences.cn: 比起疾病,那个冒牌医生对我的伤害更深.

sentences.en: The quack was stormed with questions.
sentences.cn: 江湖骗子受到了猛烈的质问.

sentences.en: There were ducks quacking on the lawn.
sentences.cn: 有鸭子在草坪上发出嘎嘎的叫着。

sentences.en: Why do intelligent people find quack remedies so appealing?
sentences.cn: 为什么聪明人会被江湖医术所吸引？

sentences.en: You’d better go and see the quack with that burn.
sentences.cn: 你最好去找医生看看那处烧伤。

words.tran_cn: 庸医的医术；骗子的行为

trans.tran_en: relating to the activities or medicines of someone who pretends to be a doctor

trans.tran_cn: <英>江湖医生，江湖郎中，（鸭子的）呱呱声
trans.tran_en: someone who pretends to be a doctor – used in order to show disapproval

trans.tran_cn: (指鸭)呷呷地叫, 大声闲聊, 吹嘘
trans.tran_en: When a duck quacks, it makes the noise that ducks typically make
